headline: Newmont Corporation (NEM): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Newmont Corporation on r/AIPortfolios by manojs. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on NEM. Newmont Corporation’s share was trading at $122.13 as of February 20th. NEM’s trailing and forward P/E were 15.66 and 15.82 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. headline: Newmont Extends Cerro Negro With Cash Funded Growth And Rising Momentum
summary: Newmont (NYSE:NEM) plans to invest about $800 million to extend the life of its Cerro Negro mine beyond 2035. The commitment is supported by strong 2025 free cash flow and a move to a net cash position. The company expects to fund the project without taking on new debt. For you as an investor, the key point is that Newmont is putting substantial capital into a core asset while its balance sheet sits in a net cash position. The stock is trading at $130.0, with the share price up 6.4% over...
